HPCL0001.title: E20 MS
HPCL0001.subTitle: MOTOR FUEL
HPCL0001.description: Motor Spirit (also known as Motor Gasoline) is a distillate fraction, normally boiling within the range 30°C to 210°C. It is a complex mixture composed of relatively volatile hydrocarbons (alkanes, alkenes and aromatics with typical carbon chain length of C5 to C10) that vary widely in their physical and chemical properties.

specifications.property: Water tolerance of motor gasoline-alcohol blends
specifications.value: temperature for phase separation, °C, Max 10 (other months) / 0 (winter)
Max, 15 (Ethers containing 5 or more ‘C’ atoms per molecules such as MTBE, ETBE or TAME) / Not permitted (Any other oxygenates)

HPCL0001.appData: Primarily used in transportation (Cars, Sport Utility Vehicles, Motorcycles and Scooters). E20 Fuel was launched in India on 6th Feb 2023. As on date regular MS is substituted by E20 MS. It is observed that E20 fuel is being used in existing spark-ignition engine. E20 fuel has several advantages over conventional MS, such as it reduces vehicular tailpipe emissions by lowering the carbon monoxide, hydrocarbons and nitrogen oxides levels.

HPCL0002.title: HSD (High Speed Diesel )
HPCL0002.subTitle: MOTOR FUEL
HPCL0002.description: High-Speed Diesel (HSD), also known as Automotive Diesel Fuel, is produced from the fractional distillation of crude oil between 200°C and 400°C resulting in a mixture of carbon chains and is composed of saturated hydrocarbons and aromatic hydrocarbons.

specifications.property: Carbon residue (Ramsbottom or micro) on 10 % residue
Oxidation stability (for diesel fuel having FAME content of above 2 percent v/v)
Oxidation stability (for diesel fuel having FAME content of above 2 percent v/v)

specifications.value: wear scar diameter (wsd) at 60 ºC, μm, Max 460

HPCL0002.appData: HSD is commonly used as a fuel in medium and high-speed compression ignition engine in commercial vehicle, stationery diesel engines, locomotive and pumps etc. It is also used as fuel in power generation (DG sets), agriculture and construction machinery.

HPCL0003.title: Ethanol
HPCL0003.subTitle: FUEL ADDITIVE FOR MS
HPCL0003.description:
Ethanol meant for E20 blending having purity of min. 99.5% and other components including water max. 0.5%. Anhydrous Ethanol is known as Ethyl Alcohol, is a clear, colourless and homogenous liquid with high purity, also known as Absolute Alcohol. 
Anhydrous Ethanol is categorized into 1G and 2G, based on its source of raw material used. 1G Ethanol produced from raw materials viz. sugarcane juice, molasses, damaged food grains. 2G Ethanol are generally made from biomass. 1G Ethanol is produced by subsidiary unit HPCL-Biofuel Ltd.
HPCL0003.appData: Ethanol is an environment friendly fuel used for blending with Motor Spirit (MS).

HPCL0004.title: Kerosene
HPCL0004.subTitle: FUEL
HPCL0004.description: Kerosene is distillate fractions of crude oil in the boiling range of 150-250°C. It is a complex mixture of hydrocarbons from crude oil distillation, primarily containing alkanes (paraffins), cycloalkanes (naphthenes) and some aromatics like alkylbenzenes.

specifications.property: Colour Saybolt (in case of undyed Kerosene)
Colour Visual (in case of dyed Kerosene)

specifications.value: Not limited, but to be reported

HPCL0004.appData:
Kerosene is one of the most versatile hydrocarbon fuels in the industry. Kerosene is used in many industrial applications like heating, cleaning and as thinner. It is also used for lighting lamps in areas where electricity is not available. Use of Public Distribution System (PDS) Kerosene (Blue Dyed) has reduced drastically. 
Kerosene with ultra-low sulfur content upto 10 mg/kg is used as pipeline compatible plug material (PCK) in multi-product pipeline operations in Petroleum Industry. Chemical industry uses kerosene as a petroleum solvent and in pesticide industry.
HPCL0004.industrial: Domestic Use, Petroleum Industry. Chemical Industry & Pesticide industry

HPCL0005.title: ATF (Jet A-1) (Aviation Turbine Fuel Jet A-1)
HPCL0005.subTitle: AVIATION FUEL
HPCL0005.description: Aviation Turbine Fuel is a colorless, combustible, straight-run petroleum distillate, kerosene-based fuel. Kerosene makes up the majority of Jet A-1, with trace amounts of additives.

specifications.value: ATF (Jet A-1) (Aviation Turbine Fuel Jet A-1)

HPCL0005.appData: ATF Jet A-1 is used for aircrafts (Military jets) and Civil Aviation sector worldwide. It is a higher quality fuel subjected to stringent Quality Control norms set by DGCA and DGAQA.

HPCL0006.title: LPG (Liquefied Petroleum Gas)
HPCL0006.subTitle: COOKING GAS
HPCL0006.description: Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG) is a mixture of propane and butane derived from petroleum which are gaseous at normal ambient temperature and atmospheric pressure but gets condensed to the liquid state at normal ambient temperature by the application of moderate pressure.

specifications.property: Evaporation temperature in °C for 95percent by volume at760 mm Hg Pressure

specifications.value: Not worse than No. 1  (Butane, Butane-Propane mixture & Propane)

HPCL0006.appData: LPG is mostly used in domestic and commercial purpose for cooking and heating. It is also used in transportation vehicle as a fuel and as metal cutting gas.
HPCL0006.industrial: Domestic Use, Petroleum Industry. Transportation vehicle.

HPCL0007.title: LAN (Low Aromatic Naphtha)
HPCL0007.subTitle: INDUSTRIAL FEEDSTOCK/FUEL
HPCL0007.description: Petroleum naphtha is a complex mixture of hydrocarbons, primarily C5–C8 alkanes (paraffins), cycloparaffins, and aromatics, with specific compositions varying significantly based on the crude oil source and refining process. It contains higher percentage of paraffins and low percentage of aromatic hydrocarbons (such as benzene, toluene, and xylene). It also contains sulfur compounds.
HPCL0007.appData: Naphtha is used by refineries in blending of petroleum products, isomerization, reforming, and in the production of value-added products. Naphtha serves as a primary feedstock for the production of gasoline. It is also a crucial component in the manufacturing of various petrochemical products, including plastics, fertilizers, and synthetic fibres. Naphtha is a key raw material for the production of various plastics, including polyethylene (PE), polypropylene (PP), and polystyrene (PS).

HPCL0008.title: FOOD GRADE HEXANE
HPCL0008.subTitle: PROCESS SOLVENT
HPCL0008.description: Food Grade Hexane is a highly purified petroleum distillate fraction that contains a high proportion of n-hexane with boiling range of 63 to 70°C. It is a clear colourless liquid with distinct odour, free from sediment, suspended matter and moisture.
HPCL0008.appData: Food Grade Hexane is used in Food processing industry as a solvent to extract edible oils with minimum harmful residue to meet strict purity standards set by statutory bodies such as FSSAI. It is also used in Drug and Pharmaceuticals industry for drug extraction and as a cleaning agent.

HPCL0009.title: Solvent 1425
HPCL0009.subTitle: PROCESS SOLVENT
HPCL0009.description: Solvent 1425 is a petroleum-derived industrial solvent having a complex mixture of petroleum hydrocarbons that vary widely in their physical and chemical properties with boiling range between 50 - 120°C. Solvent 1425 is having strong solvency power due to its wide chemical composition. Solvent 1425 is having higher evaporation rate that improves efficiency of the solvent.

specifications.property: Distillation 50 % by volume recovered at, in °C
Distillation 95 % by volume recovered at, in °C

HPCL0009.appData: Solvent 1425 is a highly versatile hydrocarbon solvent with a wide range of industrial and commercial applications. Solvent 1425 is a potent degreaser, effectively removing oil, grease, wax, and tar from various surfaces. It is commonly used in cleaning engines, parts and tools. Solvent 1425 finds application in the paint and coatings industry. It is used for diluting paints, varnishes, and lacquers to adjust viscosity and improve application. Solvent 1425 as a cleaning and degreasing agent in leather and rubber industry.

HPCL0010.title: MTO (Mineral Turpentine Oil) / Solvent 2445
HPCL0010.subTitle: PROCESS SOLVENT
HPCL0010.description: Solvent 2445, commonly referred to as MTO, is a petroleum-derived aliphatic hydrocarbon solvent obtained from the middle distillate/naphtha range. It is a water-white, highly volatile, low-viscosity solvent used extensively in paints, adhesives, and chemical industries. It has boiling range between 125 - 240°C.

specifications.property: Distillation 50 % by volume recovered at, in °C
Distillation 95 % by volume recovered at, in °C

HPCL0010.appData: Solvent 2445 is a versatile and widely used solvent with significant applications across industries. Solvent 2445's high solvency power, low toxicity, moderate evaporation rate, and inertness make it a valuable substance in various cleaning, degreasing, and dissolving processes. Its unique properties make it an essential component in the formulation of paints, adhesives, inks, and numerous other products.

HPCL0011.title: FO (MV2 Grade)
HPCL0011.subTitle: INDUSTRIAL FUEL
HPCL0011.description: Fuel oil is a dark viscous residual fuels obtained by blending mainly heavier components from crude distillation unit. It is generally consisted of heavy petroleum product. Efficiency and type of fuel oil widely varies depending on kinematic viscosity and sulphur content.

specifications.value: Not limited, but to be reported

specifications.property: Density at 15°C kg/m3 or Relative density at 15.6/15.6°C
specifications.value: Not limited, but to be reported

HPCL0011.appData: Fuel oil is used as a backup fuel for power generation in facilities where a reliable power supply is crucial. It is used in thermal power plants for boiler start up. It serves as a contingency option during periods of fuel shortages or interruptions in primary fuel sources. Fuel oil is used in various industrial applications for heating purposes. Cement and Steel plants use fuel oil as a source of energy in furnaces for high heat processes.
HPCL0011.industrial: Power, Marine, Manufacturing (Steel, Cement, Glass, Ceramic Industries)

HPCL0012.title: Heating Oil (LDO)
HPCL0012.subTitle: INDUSTRIAL FUEL
HPCL0012.description: Heating Oil also known as Light Diesel Oil (LDO) consists of medium length chains of hydrogen and carbon mainly alkanes, cycloalkanes, aromatics and oils. Basically, Heating oil is termed for medium commercial extracts from crude oil. It is either distilled or residual fraction of various oils that is extracted while distillation. It has a lower flash point compared to heavier Fuel Oil (FO), for easier ignition.

specifications.value: on whole samples, percent by mass, Max 1.5

HPCL0012.appData: LDO is known for its efficient combustion properties. This fuel is free flowing in nature. It is largely an industrial fuel. It finds extensive use in industries such as manufacturing, power generation, and heating systems. It is commonly used in boilers, furnaces, and other equipment that require a steady and controlled source of heat.

HPCL0013.title: HFHSD (High Flash High Speed Diesel - Distillate Marine Fuel )
HPCL0013.subTitle: MARINE FUEL
HPCL0013.description: High Flash High Speed Diesel (HFHSD) is a special grade of diesel fuel with flash point (Min. 66°C) significantly higher than that of HSD (Min. 35°C). It consists of hydrocarbons with carbon numbers predominantly in the range of C9 to C28, with a boiling range of approximately 150°C to 400°C. It is produced by refining middle-distillate fractions to meet stringent safety and performance specifications IS 16731(ISO 8217).

specifications.property: Carbon residue – Micro method on the 10 % volume distillation residue

specifications.value: corrected wear scar diameter (WSD) at 60 °C, μm, Max 520

HPCL0013.appData: HFHSD is mainly manufactured for non-automotive applications. It is mainly applicable for marine use by Indian Navy, Merchant Ships, fishing vessels etc. where a high flash point diesel is required.

HPCL0014.title: VLSFO (Very Low Sulfur Fuel Oil) RMG380
HPCL0014.subTitle: MARINE FUEL
HPCL0014.description: VLSFO is a type of marine fuel that complies with the International Maritime Organization (IMO) – Marine Oil Pollution Control (MARPOL) regulations to reduce sulphur emissions from ships. It is generally blended from different refinery streams to achieve low sulfur levels while maintaining suitable viscosity and energy content for ship engines. VLSFO is a cleaner marine fuel with very low sulfur content (0.5% by wt. max./as per statutory norms) and prescribed limit of element content in fuel (Na, V, Al, Si, Ca, Zn, P).
HPCL0014.appData: VLSFO is primarily used as a marine fuel in ships to comply with IMO regulations. VLSFO is used in various types of vessels, including container ships, bulk carriers, etc.

HPCL0015.title: LSHS (Low Sulphur Heavy Stock)
HPCL0015.subTitle: INDUSTRIAL FUEL
HPCL0015.description: Low Sulphur Heavy Stock (LSHS) is a dense, viscous residual product from crude oil distillation, featuring a black, thick liquid form with Low Sulfur (Max. 1.8%) content as per customer requirement.
HPCL0015.appData: LSHS is used mainly in heavy industry, steel plants, and power plants as fuel. LSHS is mainly used in steel production and where the finished product to be heated are likely to get contaminated with sulfur.

HPCL0016.title: Paving Bitumen (VG10)
HPCL0016.subTitle: ROAD CONSTRUCTION MATERIAL
HPCL0016.description: Bitumen is obtained as the last residue in fractional distillation of crude petroleum. It is defined as a viscous liquid, or a solid, consisting essentially of complex mixture of hydrocarbons including high-molecular-weight compounds, such as asphaltenes, and lighter fractions, such as aromatics and saturates. It is substantially non-volatile and softens gradually when heated. It is black or brown in colour & possesses waterproofing and adhesive properties.
HPCL0016.appData: Paving bitumen is extensively used in the construction of roads, highways and airport tarmac.

HPCL0017.title: Paving Bitumen (VG30)
HPCL0017.subTitle: ROAD CONSTRUCTION MATERIAL
HPCL0017.description: Bitumen is obtained as the last residue in fractional distillation of crude petroleum. It is defined as a viscous liquid, or a solid, consisting essentially of complex mixture of hydrocarbons including high-molecular-weight compounds, such as asphaltenes, and lighter fractions, such as aromatics and saturates. It is substantially non-volatile and softens gradually when heated. It is black or brown in colour & possesses waterproofing and adhesive properties.
HPCL0017.appData: Paving bitumen is extensively used in the construction of roads, highways and airport tarmac.

HPCL0018.title: Paving Bitumen (VG40)
HPCL0018.subTitle: ROAD CONSTRUCTION MATERIAL
HPCL0018.description: Bitumen is obtained as the last residue in fractional distillation of crude petroleum. It is defined as a viscous liquid, or a solid, consisting essentially of complex mixture of hydrocarbons including high-molecular-weight compounds, such as asphaltenes, and lighter fractions, such as aromatics and saturates. It is substantially non-volatile and softens gradually when heated. It is black or brown in colour & possesses waterproofing and adhesive properties.
HPCL0018.appData: Paving bitumen is extensively used in the construction of roads, highways and airport tarmac.

HPCL0019.title: HP TRANSFORMER OIL I
HPCL0019.subTitle: Inhibited Transformer Oil (IS:12463 / IS:335 Type II)
HPCL0019.description: HP TRANSFORMER OIL I is an inhibited type insulating transformer oil formulated to meet IS:12463 and IS:335-2018 Type II specifications. It provides excellent dielectric strength, oxidation stability and long service life for transformers and switchgear equipment.
HPCL0019.appData: Recommended for power transformers, distribution transformers, switchgear and other oil-filled electrical equipment requiring inhibited insulating oils with high dielectric strength and oxidation resistance.

HPCL0020.subTitle: Base Oil

HPCL0027.title: CBFS
HPCL0027.subTitle: SPECIALITY
HPCL0027.description: CBFS Stands for Carbon Black Feedstock composition, rich in aromatics like naphthalene. There are two types of CBFS viz. High BMCI type and General type. "BMCI" (Bureau of Mines Co-relation Index) effectively measures the degree yield of Carbon Black. The higher the number, the better the yield of Carbon Black. Sulphur content in CBFS reduces the effect of BMCI value.
HPCL0027.appData: Primary use as a reinforcing agent in tires, belts, hoses, improving strength and wear resistance.

HPCL0028.title: HYTHERM 500
HPCL0028.subTitle: THERMIC FLUIDS
HPCL0028.description: The product is manufactured from petroleum stocks produced by special reﬁning process in which the thermally unstable components are removed. HYTHERM 500 is recommended in service involving a maximum bulk oil temperature of 290°C. In addition, it has the following beneﬁts a)Excellent oxidation & chemical stability b)Good heat transfer properties c) Low volatility & d) Non-corrosive and non-toxic
HPCL0028.appData: All types of heat transfer applications. This grades ﬁnds extensive application in textile, pharmaceuticals, chemical and processing industries.
HPCL0028.industrial: Textile, pharmaceuticals, chemical and processing industries.

HPCL0029.title: HYTHERM 600
HPCL0029.subTitle: THERMIC FLUIDS
HPCL0029.description: This grade is derived from the ﬁnest quality petroleum base stocks and is fortiﬁed with high performance additives to enhance performance at higher temperatures. It has the following outstanding features a) Ability to provide superior performance in indirect closed ﬂuid heat transfer system up to bulk operating temperature up to 320°C b) Increased life, reduced oxidation and thermal degradation & c) Minimal fouling and deposit formation on heat transfer surface. Hence sustained heat transfer characteristics
HPCL0029.appData: All types of heat transfer applications. This grades ﬁnds extensive application in textile, pharmaceuticals, chemical and processing industries.
HPCL0029.industrial: Textile, pharmaceuticals, chemical and processing industries.

HPCL0030.title: HP Diesel Exhaust Fluid (DEF)
HPCL0030.subTitle: Motor Fuel
HPCL0030.description: DEF, most commonly refers to Diesel Exhaust Fluid, is a crucial non-toxic liquid (32.5% urea, 67.5% deionized water) used in modern diesel engines with Selective Catalytic Reduction (SCR) systems to convert harmful Nitrogen Oxides (NOx) into harmless nitrogen and water, meeting latest emission standards.
HPCL0030.appData: HP DEF is recommended for modern Commercial Vehicles (Trucks & Buses), Diesel SUVs and any other BS IV / VI or (Euro IV/V/VI) compliant diesel engines employing SCR / EGR-SCR technology for NOx reduction
alternatives: Valvoline Cummins Genuine DEF, Gulf AL Diesel Exhaust Fluid, Velvex,power oil adblue,IOC Clearblue,MAK adblue
related: TATA MOTORS HP GENUINE DEF (Rebrand of HP DEF)

HPCL0031.title: HP GAS
HPCL0031.subTitle: Domestic / Commercial / Industrial Fuel/Free trade LPG
HPCL0031.description: HP GAS (LPG) is a clean, efficient, and high-calorific gaseous fuel comprising mainly of mixture of  Propane (C₃H₈) and Butane (C₄H₁₀) . It is colourless, odourless in natural form (odorized with Ethyl Mercaptan for safety), non-toxic. HP GAS is produced during petroleum refining and gas processing

specifications.value: Propane / Butane mixture as per IS 4576

specifications.property: C5 Hydrocarbons and Heavier (% of vol)

HPCL0031.appData: Cooking fuel (domestic & commercial)    Industrial heating, drying & processing            Metal cutting & brazing                                              Fuel for LPG-based gensets, vaporizers & furnaces

HPCL0032.title: HP GAS FLAME PLUS
HPCL0032.subTitle: Commercial
HPCL0032.description: HP GAS FLAME PLUS is LPG fortified with an additive to enhance the combustion properties of LPG. The additive increases the flame temperature and also improves the combustion kinetics of propane/butane and flame properties, thereby resulting in quicker heating, reduced gas consumption, reduced process time and hence more savings for the customers.
HPCL0032.industrial: hospitality (hotels, restaurants, canteens), bakeries, food processing, and various industries etc

HPCL0033.title: HP ROLMET 7
HPCL0033.subTitle: ROLLING OILS
HPCL0033.description:
HP ROLMET 7 is a neat cold rolling oil for use in Cold rolling of stainless steels requiring high degree of “BA Finish” (Bright Annealing) , very smooth surface Texture with spot free ﬁnish.

HP ROLMET 7 is made out of highly reﬁned low viscosity base oil having ultra-low sulfur and aromatic content. This oil contains carefully selected additive chemistry intended to give superior performance of high VI, Rust prevention, besides Non staining characteristics .

The oil provides optimum co-efﬁcient of friction between the roll bites depending upon the type of metal surface, roll diameter, rolling speed and percentage reduction.
HPCL0033.appData: HP ROLMET 7 is used as a neat cold rolling oil in stainless steel cold rolling operations where a high degree of BA (Bright Annealed) finish is required. It is suitable for precision rolling applications demanding very smooth surface texture, spot-free finish, and consistent surface brightness. The oil provides an optimum coefficient of friction at the roll bite, ensuring stable rolling performance across different metal surfaces, roll diameters, rolling speeds, and percentage reductions. Its non-staining nature, rust prevention capability, and superior lubricity make it ideal for high-speed rolling and critical final or intermediate passes where surface quality and dimensional control are essential.
HPCL0033.industrial: stainless steel processing and cold rolling industry,

HPCL0034.title: HP ROLMET V 45
HPCL0034.subTitle: ROLLING OILS
HPCL0034.description: HP ROLMET V 45 is compounded rolling oil specially designed for rolling of both ferrous and non-ferrous metals. Particularly useful for cold rolling of carbon and alloy steel, brass and copper.
HPCL0034.appData: HP ROLMET V 45 is a compounded rolling oil designed for cold rolling of both ferrous and non-ferrous metals. It is particularly suitable for rolling of carbon steel and alloy steel, as well as brass and copper, where balanced lubricity and good surface finish are required. The oil provides controlled friction at the roll bite, ensuring smooth rolling, reduced roll force, and improved surface quality under moderate load and reduction conditions. It is commonly used in general cold rolling operations and intermediate passes.
HPCL0034.industrial: Cold rolling mills and metal processing industries

HPCL0035.title: HP ROLMET V 45, V 55
HPCL0035.subTitle: ROLLING OILS
HPCL0035.description: HP ROLMET V 55 is a higher viscosity oil for rolling of both ferrous and non-ferrous metals.
HPCL0035.appData: HP ROLMET V 55 is a higher viscosity compounded rolling oil developed for more severe cold rolling conditions involving both ferrous and non-ferrous metals. It is recommended for applications requiring heavier reductions, higher rolling pressures, and improved load-carrying capacity, such as rolling of carbon and alloy steels, brass, and copper. The higher viscosity helps maintain a stable lubricating film, resulting in reduced roll wear, improved strip surface quality, and consistent mill performance in demanding rolling operations.
HPCL0035.industrial: Heavy-duty cold rolling mills and metal forming industries

HPCL0036.title: HP ROLMET N34
HPCL0036.subTitle: ROLLING OILS
HPCL0036.description: Non staining rolling oil specially designed for rolling of copper and copper alloys useful in multi roller mills as a bearing lubricant as well.
HPCL0036.appData: Rolling of copper and its alloys such as brass and German silver. The oil can be used for rolling in multi roller mills such as SENOZIMER & SUNOWIG. Can also be used for carbon steel andstainless steel strips.
HPCL0036.industrial: non-ferrous metal processing and cold rolling industry

HPCL0037.title: HP ROLMET 40
HPCL0037.subTitle: ROLLING OILS
HPCL0037.description: Rolling oil specially designed for rolling of both ferrous and non-ferrous metals suitable for usage in sendzimer mills.
HPCL0037.appData: Useful for rolling of both ferrous and non-ferrous metals. This product will also act as a lubricant for the precision roll support bearing.
HPCL0037.industrial: cold rolling and metal processing industry

HPCL0038.title: HP METAQUENCH 39
HPCL0038.subTitle: SPECIALITY
HPCL0038.description: These are blends of refined base oils and contain no additives. METAQUENCH 39 is recommended for general purpose quenching of components and is particularly suitable for quenching of cyanided parts.
HPCL0038.appData: General purpose quenching oil of all components including cyanided parts

HPCL0039.title: HP METAQUENCH 40
HPCL0039.subTitle: SPECIALITY
HPCL0039.description: These are blends of refined base oils and contain no additives. METAQUENCH 40 is suitable in situations when lower quenching speed is desired.
HPCL0039.appData: General purpose quenching oil of all components.

HPCL0040.title: HP METAQUENCH 42
HPCL0040.subTitle: SPECIALITY
HPCL0040.description: General purpose quenching oil of all components. However, this oil is not suitable for quenching cyanided parts.
HPCL0040.appData: General purpose quenching oil of all components. However, this oil is not suitable for quenching cyanided parts.

HPCL0041.title: HP METAQUENCH 43
HPCL0041.subTitle: SPECIALITY
HPCL0041.description: This is an additive type of quenching oil with good dispersant properties and excellent heat transfer characteristics.
HPCL0041.appData: General purpose quenching oil of all components. Suitable for applications where dirt accumulation on the metal is a bane.

HPCL0042.title: HP METAQUENCH 44
HPCL0042.subTitle: SPECIALITY
HPCL0042.description: Quenching oil with excellent dispersant properties. The oil is fortified with carefully selected dispersant to provide minimum quench distortion. Cooling rates are markedly faster enabling achievement of higher surface hardness.
HPCL0042.appData: General purpose quenching oil of all components. Suitable for applications where dirt accumulation on the metal is a bane and where higher surface hardness is required.

HPCL0043.title: HP METAQUENCH 44 H
HPCL0043.subTitle: SPECIALITY
HPCL0043.description: METAQUENCH 44 H is a premium low viscosity quenching oil based upon specialty solvent-refined base oil to minimize oxidation and ensure consistent performance under the most arduous operating conditions.
HPCL0043.appData: METAQUENCH 44 H finds wide use as a quenching oil for varied applications where faster quenching rate is essential.

HPCL0044.title: HP METAQUENCH 45
HPCL0044.subTitle: SPECIALITY
HPCL0044.description: METAQUENCH 45 is the Quenching oil for meeting very fast quenching requirement with excellent dispersant properties. The high quality paraffinic oil is fortified with carefully selected dispersant to provide minimum Quench distortion. The additive system prevents build-up of sludge and dirt.

HPCL0045.title: HP METAQUENCH 85
HPCL0045.subTitle: SPECIALITY
HPCL0045.description: This is a marquenching oil suitable for maintaining the quenching bath at temperatures between 150-220°C.
HPCL0045.appData: Suitable for mass production of high precision, high quality products such as bearing races gears and other components.

During these operations considerable amount of heat and stress and developed. Our DRAWMET grades are tailor made to satisfy the various requirements included in metal drawing/forging operations.
HPCL0107.appData: The product has been specially developed for aluminum wire drawing applications. This product ensures nil wire breakage and scouring. DRAWMET 15 S is recommended for high speed drawing and can be used in the gear box of drawing equipment.

HPCL0142.title: ENKLO HLP T PLUS(ISO VG 46 & ISO VG 68)
HPCL0142.subTitle: Hydraulic Oil
HPCL0142.description:
ENKLO HLP T PLUS is a high performance hydraulic fluid based severely hydro treated base stocks. The unique anti wear additive system provides enhanced protection for components as compared to traditional hydraulic oil meeting DIN 51524 Part II (HLP) and Parker Denison HF-0. The additive system is thermally stable and resists hydrolysis in the combined presence of thermal, mechanical and chemical stress.ENKLO HLP T Plus series hydraulic oil has passed the demanding Bosch Rexroth RFT-APU-CL Closed Loop Axial Pump test. The test pump operation includes certain periods where pressure exceeds 500 bar with temperatures touching peak of 100 degrees C . The total duration of testing is 510 hours.
ENKLO HLP T Plus series also exceeds the requirement of DENISON HF-0 and has comfortably passed the Parker Denison Hybrid Pump test plus the EATON Vickers 35VQ25 Pump test. The product has excellent filterability.
HPCL0142.appData: ENKLO HLP T PLUS carries the formal approval and listing from Bosch Rexroth and Fives Cincinnati Lab (earlier known as Cincinnati Milacron). By virtue of these approvals ENKLO HLP T PLUS grades can be used in hydraulic system of plastic injection molding machines, hydraulic systems in steel, mobile equipment & engineering industries where the latest pumps of Bosch Rexroth are in use.

HPCL0143.title: ENKLO FRDU 46(FIRE RESISTANT HYDRAULIC FLUID )
HPCL0143.subTitle: Hydraulic Oil
HPCL0143.description: ENKLO FRDU grades are fire resistant hydraulic fluids based on organic ester. These fluids meet the HF-DU classification system as per European Mines Safety Commision. These fluids can replace phosphate esters in high temperature applications and are recommended as control governor fluids for steam and gas turbine. They do not have any seal compatibility issues which are inherent in phosphate ester fluids. The same seals used with mineral oils can be used with ENKLO FRDU 46. These fluids not only provide improved safety as compared to mineral oil but offer superior lubricity and antiwear properties as compared to invert emulsion (FRIE) fluids and also mineral oil based hydraulic fluids. While changing over from invert emulsion to FRDU based fluids care must be taken that there is no residual fluid or moisture present in the system. If necessary the line may be flushed with mineral oil to ensure that no traces of invert emulsion fluid remains in the system.

specifications.property: Pump Wear Test (Total Ring & Vane Mass Loss)

HPCL0143.appData: These fluids can replace phosphate esters in high temperature applications and are recommended as control governor fluids for steam and gas turbine.

They do not have any seal compatibility issues which are inherent in phosphate ester fluids. The same seals used with mineral oils can be used with ENKLO FRDU 68. HPCL0146.title: ENKLO FRWG 46(FIRE RESISTANT HYDRAULIC FLUID )
HPCL0146.subTitle: Hydraulic Oil
HPCL0146.description: ENKLO FRWG is a hydraulic oil formulated from glycols for meeting the fire resistant requirements in fire prone areas in Steel, Mining, Die-Casting and Plastics industries. It is a true solution of glycols and water. This grade is composed of Polyalkylene Glycols, selected additives for wear reduction, corrosion inhibitors, anti-oxidants, anti-foamants and water. The operating temperature of the oil ranges from -20°C to +60°C. This oil is suitable for use in all low temperature applications without any chance of freezing and gelling. This oil meets IS: 10532 (part–3) – 1993 and HF-C classification of European Mines Safety Commission.
HPCL0146.appData: This oil is suitable for use in the hydraulic systems of coke oven battery carrier, crane hydraulics in high temperature regions of Steel Plants. It is used in control governors in steam turbines, control valves in presence of superheated steam in Power Plants. It is also suitable for use in hydrostatic systems in Plastics and Die-Casting industries.

HPCL0189.title: DPNG (Domestic PNG)
HPCL0189.subTitle: Natural Gas
HPCL0189.description: DPNG (Domestic Piped Natural Gas) is supplied through the city gas distribution network to residential households primarily for cooking. After pressure reduction through district regulating stations or through Decompression units,  DPNG is delivered at very low pressure, typically in the range of 20–30 milli bar.

specifications.property: Domestic Piped Natural Gas (DPNG) is a gaseous fuel supplied to residential consumers through the city gas distribution network at very low pressure. Chemically
specifications.value: DPNG consists predominantly of methane (CH₄), typically in the range of 85–95 percent by volume, with the balance comprising small quantities of ethane (C₂H₆), propane (C₃H₈), butane (C₄H₁₀), and inert gases such as nitrogen (N₂) and carbon dioxide (CO₂) within permissible limits. Sulphur compounds are maintained at extremely low levels, and a sulfur-based odorant (generally Ethyl Mercapton) is deliberately added for leak detection @ 10 ppm approx.. DPNG has a gross calorific value generally in the range of 9,500–10,500 kcal per SCM, is non-toxic, lighter than air, and burns with a clean blue flame, making it suitable and safe for domestic cooking applications.

HPCL0189.appData: Used to light cooking stoves , domestic geysers etc.

HPCL0192.title: LNG
HPCL0192.subTitle: Natural Gas
HPCL0192.description: Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG) is natural gas that has been cooled to approximately –162°C, converting it from a gaseous state into a liquid. reducing its  volume by  600 times, enabling efficient storage and transportation over long distances where pipelines are not feasible. LNG is used as a fuel for power generation, industrial applications, and increasingly heavy-duty transport fuel. It is supplied from LNG terminals, to industrial storage facilities, through Cryogenic Tankers.

specifications.property: Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG) is natural gas that is cooled to –160°C to –162°C
specifications.value: converting it into a liquid to reduce its volume by about 600 times for efficient storage and transport. Chemically, LNG is methane-rich (typically above 90% CH₄) with small amounts of ethane, propane, and nitrogen. Before liquefaction, the gas is dried and purified to remove CO₂, H₂S, mercury, and heavier hydrocarbons to avoid freezing and corrosion at cryogenic temperatures. LNG has a gross calorific value of roughly 52,000–55,000 kJ/kg and is stored at near-atmospheric pressure in insulated tanks. It is regasified for pipeline supply or used directly as a cleaner fuel for power generation, industry, marine transport, and heavy-duty vehicles, offering lower emissions of SOx, NOx, particulate matter, and CO₂ compared to liquid fossil fuels. Safety systems for leak detection and vapor dispersion are essential due to its cryogenic and flammable nature.

HPCL0192.appData: Used As both  Industrial Fuel and Motor Fuel
packaging: Stored and Transported in cryogenic tankers
HPCL0192.industrial: Industries Such as Glass manufacturers, Ceramics, Metals and Transpiration fuel for Heavy duty Vehicles

These oils are compatible with high-pressure syn gas operations, provide excellent oxidation resistance, and virtually eliminate the risk of catalyst poisoning due to extremely low sulphur content (< 5 ppm).
HPCL0208.appData: Syn gas compressors, LDPE compressors, high-pressure compressor systems, gas processing plants, catalyst-sensitive applications.

HPCL0209.title: HP KISAN SHAKTI
HPCL0209.subTitle: Agriculture Oils
HPCL0209.description: HP KISAN SHAKTI is an engine oil developed for agricultural Pump-Sets running on Diesel, Kerosene or Light Diesel Oil (LDO). The product is made from paraffinic base stocks and fortified with select additives to deliver performance benefits in the pump-sets used in agriculture and farming activities. The superior additive chemistry not only ensures greater protection of the engine against wear and rust, its balanced detergency helps to keep the engine clean and trouble free for longer service intervals.
HPCL0209.appData: HP KISAN SHAKTI is recommended for all types of agricultural and farm equipment like Pumpsets, Tractors, Powertillers, Harvesters & DG sets requiring good quality Diesel Engine Oils. HP KISAN SHAKTI can also be used in petrol engines to render satisfactory performance.
packaging: from small retail packs to bulk supply.

HPCL0210.title: HP KISAN SHAKTI UTTO
HPCL0210.subTitle: Universal Tractor Transmission Oil (UTTO)
HPCL0210.description: HP KISAN SHAKTI UTTO is a premium quality Universal Tractor Transmission Oil formulated from high quality hydrotreated base stocks and carefully selected additives. It is designed to deliver superior performance in transmission, hydraulic, final drive and PTO systems of modern tractors.
HPCL0210.appData: Recommended for tractors manufactured by major OEMs such as Mahindra & Mahindra, TAFE, Eicher, SAME, ITL, Swaraj, Escorts, John Deere, CNH and similar equipment. Also suitable for off-road and construction equipment requiring UTTO type transmission fluids.

HPCL0211.title: HP KISAN TRACTOR OIL 20W-40
HPCL0211.subTitle: Tractor Engine Oil
HPCL0211.description: HP KISAN TRACTOR OIL 20W-40 is a good quality engine oil specifically designed to withstand the operational severity of Indian tractors in field usage. It is formulated with paraffinic base stocks and selected additives to provide reliable lubrication and satisfactory performance in earlier models of tractors. The product is particularly suitable for older diesel engines requiring lower detergency levels.
HPCL0211.appData: Recommended for earlier models of tractors of all makes, agricultural machinery and farm equipment operating under moderate to severe working conditions.

HPCL0212.title: HP PUMPSET OIL
HPCL0212.subTitle: Diesel Engine Oil
HPCL0212.description: HP PUMPSET OIL is a good quality diesel engine oil specially designed for agricultural pump set engines. It is formulated to provide dependable lubrication and protection under continuous operating conditions and meets API CF/SF performance requirements.
HPCL0212.appData: Recommended for agricultural pump set diesel engines and similar stationary farm equipment operating under moderate to heavy duty conditions.

HPCL0213.title: HP TRACTOR OIL 15W-40
HPCL0213.subTitle: Tractor Engine Oil
HPCL0213.description: HP TRACTOR OIL 15W-40 is a premium quality tractor engine oil formulated with high quality paraffinic base stocks and advanced additive technology. It offers excellent soot handling, protection against corrosive wear, thermal stability, piston cleanliness, valve train protection and resistance to oxidation, foaming and viscosity loss under severe operating conditions.
HPCL0213.appData: Recommended for modern emission compliant TREM IIIA tractor engines from John Deere, Mahindra & Mahindra, Escorts, Sonalika (ITL), New Holland, HMT, TAFE etc. Also suitable for older tractors, construction equipment and DG sets.

HPCL0214.title: HP WET BRAKE OIL
HPCL0214.subTitle: Universal Tractor Transmission Oil (UTTO)
HPCL0214.description: HP WET BRAKE OIL is a Universal Tractor Transmission Oil (UTTO) formulated with high quality base stocks and carefully selected additives. It delivers superior performance in transmission, hydraulic, final drive and PTO systems of tractors, ensuring smooth operation and protection under demanding agricultural conditions.
HPCL0214.appData: Recommended for tractors from Eicher, Escorts, Mahindra & Mahindra, SAME, Swaraj, Sonalika, TAFE and similar makes. Suitable for off-road and construction equipment requiring UTTO type transmission fluid.

HPCL0215.title: HP SUPERTRAN
HPCL0215.subTitle: Universal Tractor Transmission Oil (UTTO)
HPCL0215.description: HP SUPERTRAN grades are premium quality Universal Tractor Transmission Oils formulated from high quality hydro-treated base stocks and carefully selected additives. They are designed to deliver excellent performance in transmission, hydraulic, final drive and PTO systems of modern tractors under demanding agricultural and off-road conditions.
HPCL0215.appData: Recommended for tractors manufactured by major OEMs such as Mahindra & Mahindra, TAFE, Eicher, SAME, Swaraj, Escorts, John Deere, ITL, CNH and similar makes. Also suitable for off-road and construction equipment requiring UTTO type transmission fluid.

HPCL0216.title: HP SUPERTRAN HVI
HPCL0216.subTitle: Universal Tractor Transmission Oil (UTTO)
HPCL0216.description: HP SUPERTRAN HVI is a super-premium quality Universal Tractor Transmission Oil formulated with high quality hydrotreated base stocks and advanced additive technology. It is designed to deliver superior performance in transmission, hydraulic, final drive and PTO systems of modern tractors, offering improved viscosity stability and protection under severe operating conditions.
HPCL0216.appData: Recommended for tractors manufactured by major OEMs such as Mahindra & Mahindra, TAFE, Eicher, SAME, Swaraj, Escorts, John Deere, ITL, CNH and similar makes. Also suitable for off-road and construction equipment requiring UTTO type transmission fluids.

HPCL0217.title: HYCOM C 100, 150, 220, 320, 460
HPCL0217.subTitle: Compressor Oils
HPCL0217.description: HYCOM C grades are recommended for cylinder lubrication of single and multistage air compressors handling moist air. These oils provide excellent lubrication of piston rings, valves and cylinder liners. HYCOM C 460 features low sulphur content and is suitable for ammonia synthesis compressors used in fertilizer plants.
HPCL0217.appData: Single and multistage air compressors, moist air compressors, piston compressors, ammonia synthesis compressors in fertilizer plants.

HPCL0218.title: HYCOM TURBO SYN 10 / 15
HPCL0218.subTitle: Synthetic Seal Oils
HPCL0218.description: HYCOM TURBO SYN 10 and 15 are high performance synthetic seal oils formulated for mechanical seal systems. These products are manufactured using advanced Group IV synthetic base stocks and are FDA compliant, offering excellent thermal stability, low temperature performance and reliable sealing protection.
HPCL0218.appData: Mechanical seal systems, compressors, pumps and equipment requiring synthetic seal oils with excellent thermal stability and FDA compliant base stocks.

HPCL0219.title: HYCOM VDL T 32, 46, 68, 100, 150, 220, 320
HPCL0219.subTitle: Compressor Oils
HPCL0219.description: HYCOM VDL T grades are high performance compressor oils suitable for rotary air compressors, screw compressors and vacuum pumps. They provide reliable operation up to 250°C air discharge temperature and are also recommended for journal and antifriction bearings in high-speed, high-temperature fan applications. HYCOM VDL T 100 is an ashless fluid suitable for high pressure boiler control valves.
HPCL0219.appData: Rotary compressors, screw compressors, vacuum pumps, journal bearings, antifriction bearings, high-speed fans and high temperature industrial applications.

HPCL0220.title: CYNDOL GRADES
HPCL0220.subTitle: Cylinder Oils
HPCL0220.description: CYNDOL grades are specially formulated cylinder oils designed for lubrication of steam engine cylinders operating under highly superheated and wet saturated steam conditions. They also provide excellent performance in large slow moving industrial gears, plain bearings, calender bearings, sugar mill roller bearings and worm gears. Higher viscosity grades like CYNDOL 1000 and 1500 are also suitable for tempering and wire drawing applications.
HPCL0220.appData: Steam engines, slow moving gears, plain bearings, worm gears, calender bearings, sugar mill roller bearings, tempering and wire drawing operations.

HPCL0221.title: HP FILM OIL
HPCL0221.subTitle: Industrial Film Oil
HPCL0221.description: HP FILM OIL grades are high quality industrial lubricating oils recommended for anti-friction bearings, plain bearings, drive gears and pinions of steel mills operating under moderate conditions. They are also suitable for circulation systems where oils with excellent demulsibility characteristics are required.
HPCL0221.appData: Anti-friction bearings, plain bearings, steel mill drive gears, pinions and industrial circulation lubrication systems.

HPCL0222.title: YANTROL / YANTROL N SERIES
HPCL0222.subTitle: General Purpose Machinery Oils
HPCL0222.description: YANTROL grades are high quality lubricating oils intended for general lubrication of industrial machinery. They are manufactured from selected base stocks and fortified with antiwear and antirust additives. Specially developed for steel mill and general purpose industrial lubrication.
HPCL0222.appData: Suitable for textile mills, paper mills, machine tools and steel mill general lubrication systems.

HPCL0223.title: WAYLUBE
HPCL0223.subTitle: Machine Tool Slideway & Hydraulic Oils
HPCL0223.description: WAYLUBE grades are specially formulated machine tool slideway lubricants designed to eliminate stick-slip motion and chatter in slow moving machine parts. They provide mild EP protection, rust prevention and can also function as combined hydraulic and way lubricants in non-critical systems.
HPCL0223.appData: Recommended for slideway lubrication of planers, grinders, shapers, jig borers, horizontal boring machines and combined hydraulic & way lubrication systems. Meets Cincinnati Milacron P-47 thermal stability test.

HPCL0224.title: HYTAK
HPCL0224.subTitle: Open Gear, Chain & Wire Rope Lubricants
HPCL0224.description: HYTAK series are heavy, viscous, black petroleum based lubricants formulated for open gears, chains and wire ropes. They provide excellent film strength, high load carrying capability, strong tackiness and rust protection. Designed to remain in place under severe pressure and operating conditions.
HPCL0224.appData: Recommended for lubrication of conventional open gears, cables and wire ropes. Heavier grades may require heating before application. F4 and F5 grades contain non-flammable solvent for easy cold application. Suitable for heavily loaded gears and severe service conditions.

HPCL0225.title: HYTAK 500 NB
HPCL0225.subTitle: Semi-Synthetic Open Gear Lubricant
HPCL0225.description: HYTAK 500 NB is a semi-synthetic, high viscosity open gear lubricant designed to form a thick Elasto Hydrodynamic Lubrication (EHL) film for superior load carrying capacity. It contains an advanced extreme pressure additive system to reduce operating temperature and improve efficiency. The product is clear, free from solids, heavy metals and toxic diluents, and is environmentally safer with very low PAH content.

specifications.value: Free from solids, heavy metals & chlorinated solvents

HPCL0225.appData: Recommended for open gear drives of ball mills, rotary kilns, rotary barrel mixers and dryers.

HPCL0226.title: HYTAK 500 NB-1000
HPCL0226.subTitle: Semi-Synthetic Open Gear Lubricant
HPCL0226.description: HYTAK 500 NB-1000 is a clear, semi-synthetic open gear lubricant formulated to replace conventional black oils and graphite greases. It is free from solids, heavy metals and toxic diluents, offering safer and cleaner operation. The product improves lubrication reliability by eliminating grease separation and tubing blockages in centralized lubrication systems.

specifications.value: Free from solids, heavy metals & chlorinated solvents

HPCL0226.appData: Recommended for mill bearings, large girth gear drives and centralized lubrication systems in sugar and heavy industries. Provides cleaner and more reliable lubrication compared to graphite or black greases.

HPCL0227.title: SEETUL GRADES
HPCL0227.subTitle: Refrigeration Compressor Oils
HPCL0227.description: SEETUL grades are refrigeration compressor oils formulated from specially selected base stocks to provide low pour point, low floc point, dryness, good chemical stability and excellent solubility with liquified refrigerants. Designed for reliable lubrication in refrigeration systems.
HPCL0227.appData: Recommended for reciprocating and rotary refrigeration compressors using conventional refrigerants (except sulphur dioxide).

HPCL0228.title: SEETUL N 68 (P)
HPCL0228.subTitle: Refrigeration Compressor Oil
HPCL0228.description: SEETUL N 68 (P) is a refrigeration compressor oil formulated from specially selected deep hydro-finished base stocks to provide low pour point, dryness and excellent chemical stability. Designed specifically for ammonia and carbon dioxide refrigeration systems.
HPCL0228.appData: Recommended for reciprocating and rotary refrigeration compressors using ammonia and carbon dioxide refrigerants. Not recommended for R-12, R-22 and other Freon refrigerants.

HPCL0229.title: SEETUL RFL GRADES
HPCL0229.subTitle: Polyalkylene Glycol Refrigeration Lubricants
HPCL0229.description: SEETUL RFL grades are advanced polyalkylene glycol (PAG) based refrigeration and air-conditioning lubricants designed for wide temperature compatibility with modern refrigerants. They offer excellent thermal stability, low temperature fluidity and high miscibility with refrigerants.

specifications.value: Fully miscible & sealed tube stability pass

HPCL0229.appData: Recommended for modern refrigeration and air-conditioning compressors using R-134a and similar refrigerants requiring PAG based lubricants.

HPCL0230.title: SEETUL S 68
HPCL0230.subTitle: Fully Synthetic Refrigeration Compressor Oil (PAO Based)
HPCL0230.description: HPCL SEETUL S 68 is a fully synthetic refrigeration compressor lubricant formulated from polyalphaolefin (PAO) base fluids. It offers outstanding resistance to thermal and oxidative degradation, excellent low temperature fluidity and superior film strength under refrigerant pressure conditions. Designed for severe refrigeration and heat pump applications beyond the capability of conventional mineral oils.
HPCL0230.appData: Recommended for refrigeration compressors and heat pumps operating at very high temperatures or very low evaporator temperatures. Suitable for ammonia, carbon dioxide, HCFC (R-22) and CFC (R-12) refrigerants. Compatible with mineral oils. Not suitable for sulphur dioxide.

HPCL0231.title: SEETUL SE 68
HPCL0231.subTitle: Synthetic Ester Refrigeration Compressor Oil
HPCL0231.description: SEETUL SE 68 is a synthetic ester based refrigeration compressor lubricant designed specifically for compressors operating with HFC refrigerants such as R-134a. The product provides excellent lubricity, thermal stability and environmental compatibility. Its formulation ensures reliable performance where conventional mineral oils are unsuitable.
HPCL0231.appData: Recommended for refrigeration compressors and air-conditioning systems operating with HFC refrigerants such as R-134a where synthetic ester lubricants are required.

HPCL0232.title: SPINTEK
HPCL0232.subTitle: Spindle Oils
HPCL0232.description: SPINTEK grades are light viscosity spindle oils designed for lubrication of textile machinery, machine tools, spindle bearings, timing gears, centrifugal separators, positive displacement blowers and precision hydraulic systems. They provide smooth operation, low friction and reliable wear protection.
HPCL0232.appData: Recommended for textile machinery, spindle bearings, timing gears, centrifugal separators, positive displacement blowers and precision hydraulic systems in high speed equipment.

HPCL0233.title: SPINTEK 3
HPCL0233.subTitle: High Speed Spindle Oil
HPCL0233.description: SPINTEK 3 is a premium quality low viscosity spindle oil formulated from highly refined base oils with excellent chemical and oxidation stability. It is fortified with oxidation inhibitors, rust preventives and antiwear additives to ensure smooth operation, reduced friction and long bearing life in high speed precision machinery.
HPCL0233.appData: Recommended for lubrication of textile and machine tools, spindle bearings, timing gears, centrifugal separators, positive displacement blowers and hydraulic systems of high precision machinery.

HPCL0234.title: SPINTEK EE SERIES
HPCL0234.subTitle: Energy Efficient Spindle Oils
HPCL0234.description: SPINTEK EE grades are energy-efficient premium spindle oils formulated from highly refined base stocks with excellent oxidation stability. Fortified with rust inhibitors and antiwear additives, they provide low friction, reduced energy consumption and reliable protection for high speed precision spindles.
HPCL0234.appData: Recommended for lubrication of textile and machine tools, spindle bearings, timing gears, centrifugal separators, positive displacement blowers and hydraulic systems. SPINTEK EE 12 grade is approved by ATIRA.

HPCL0235.title: SPINTEX SYN 2
HPCL0235.subTitle: Synthetic PAO Spindle Oil
HPCL0235.description: SPINTEX SYN 2 is a fully synthetic spindle oil formulated using Polyalphaolefin (PAO) base stocks. It is near water white, food grade and offers a very high viscosity index with excellent low temperature fluidity. Designed for hydrodynamic lubrication of high speed journals and spindles.
HPCL0235.appData: Recommended for hydrodynamic lubrication of high speed journals and spindles in precision and food processing equipment requiring synthetic, low temperature spindle oils.

HPCL0236.title: STANTROL 1,3
HPCL0236.subTitle: High Temperature Chain Lubricant
HPCL0236.description: STANTROL grades are synthetic lubricants developed for lubrication of chain drives and stenters in textile and other industries. They provide excellent thermal stability, corrosion protection and reliable lubrication at elevated operating temperatures up to 200°C.
HPCL0236.appData: Recommended for lubrication of chains, chain drives and stenters operating at high temperatures up to 200°C in textile and other industrial applications.

HPCL0237.title: HP TRANSFORMER OILS
HPCL0237.subTitle: Electrical Insulating Transformer Oil
HPCL0237.description: HP TRANSFORMER OIL is a high quality insulating oil designed for safe and reliable operation of transformers and electrical equipment. The product is free from carcinogenic PCBs and PAHs and provides excellent dielectric strength, oxidation resistance and cooling performance.
HPCL0237.appData: Recommended for use in transformers, switchgear, circuit breakers and other oil-filled electrical equipment requiring high dielectric strength and reliable insulation performance.

HPCL0238.title: TURBINOL
HPCL0238.subTitle: Turbine Oils (ISO VG 32 / 46 / 68)
HPCL0238.description: TURBINOL grades are premium quality lubricating oils designed to provide efficient and trouble-free service in precision industrial machinery having exacting lubrication requirements. Formulated with selected stable base oils and effective additives, they deliver excellent oxidation stability, rust protection, water separation and long service life in turbines and hydraulic systems.
HPCL0238.appData: Recommended for lubrication of steam, gas and hydraulic turbines. Also suitable for hydraulic systems requiring long life lubricants with excellent oxidation stability, rust protection and water separation characteristics.
